issue.title: [Release] Remove SSH keys for internal use
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7828](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7828). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`dev/release/binary/id_rsa*` SSH keys are only used to login to local Docker container for
releasing binary artifacts. They aren't used over network. So putting
them to this public repository is safe.

But there are people who report "they may be danger" to us. We should
remove them from this repository and generate them locally instead of
describing why they aren't danger to reporters.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7828?focusedCommentId=17034072) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6399
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6399>
